title: About
text:
I am currently Head of Data at Sesan, a non-profit organization working with the Île-de-France Regional Health Agency (Paris area).
I am also a Research Associate in Statistics & Epidemiology at Inserm.

Professional Experience


Sesan
Head of data


Paris, France
May 2018 - present



Manage a multidisciplinary team (23 persons)

Help health professionals to identify their data needs

Design data infrastructure to collect, organize, document, and track regional health data

Develop repeatable processes and structures for regular analysis and reports

Create and maintain visualizations, dashboards and services from health data

Conduct descriptive and predictive analyses



Nantes University Hospital
Epidemiologist


Nantes, France
2013 - 2018



Develop studies in infectious diseases and child & maternal epidemiology
Manage data from hospital / regional databases, cohorts & registries
Help health professionals to develop epidemiological studies
Perform advanced biostatistics analyses
Teach Biostatistics & Epidemiology



Cayenne General Hospital
Biostatistician


Cayenne, French Guiana
2013 - 2018



Develop studies in tropical diseases epidemiology
Manage data from hospital databases, cohorts & registries
Help health professionals to analyse epidemiological data
Perform advanced biostatistics analyses



Teaching

title: Health Data Science
text:
I like to design tools from data that make insights for health professionals & patients.
I am a R & Python enthusiast.
I live in Paris with my family.
For more check out my resume and projects.

title: Projects
text:
Personal projects










ShinyRating
ShinyRating is an R package that allow to create rating inputs in Shiny. Optimized for Bootstrap 5 


Github







ShinyFriendlyCaptcha
ShinyFriendlyCaptcha is a R package that provide a GDPR compliant Captcha  to Shiny apps ((Friendly Captcha). Friendly Captcha is an European alternative to Google Recaptcha. It allow to protect websites against spam and bots in a privacy-embedded design.


Github







ShinyLemonPie
Work In Progress


Github

title: Projects
text:
Packages
During my free & professional time, I like to play with R, HTML, CSS, and Javascript to construct R shiny packages that facilitate the design of apps ready for production (and maximize time for Data Science & Research).










ShinyRating
ShinyRating is an R package that allow to create rating inputs in Shiny. Optimized for Bootstrap 5 


Github







ShinyFriendlyCaptcha
ShinyFriendlyCaptcha is a R package that provide a GDPR compliant Captcha  to Shiny apps ((Friendly Captcha). Friendly Captcha is an European alternative to Google Recaptcha. It allow to protect websites against spam and bots in a privacy-embedded design.


Github






(Work In Progress)
